author: travelandtourworld.com
title: The Spa at Four Seasons Hotel Silicon Valley at East Palo Alto is Set to Host a Spa-LidayTravelandtourworld.com
text:
The Spa at Four Seasons Hotel Silicon Valley at East Palo Alto is Set to Host a Spa-Liday Published on : Friday, October 16, 2015
The Spa at the newly enhanced Four Seasons Hotel Silicon Valley is set to host a Spa-Liday just in time for the holidays to pamper oneself as well as cross a few names off the shopping list. Guests will be able to peruse the wares of local designers and other luxury goods while sipping on bubby, nibbling on splendid fare, and even indulging with a mini spa treatment. Working in partnership with fashion and lifestyle blog Have Need Want, the event promises to deliver a festive and stylish afternoon to remember.
Guests are encouraged to meet and mingle with on-site vendors such as Natura Bissé, Moroccanoil, Devan Vincent, Camilla Olson, Turo Skin, Naked Princess and Nancy Phillips Jewelry, and even catch a filler demonstration by Reviv Med Spa.
The Spa-Liday will be held in the Hotel Lobby on Saturday, November 14, 2015 from 1:00 to 5:00 pm with mini treatments held in the adjacent “Spa Lounge.” Event is complimentary. Special gifts and raffle prizes will be offered with USD 50 minimum purchase.
Source:-Four Seasons
